archimate:BusinessObject.name: Security and Privacy Framework
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
Conceptual structure made of interlinked items underlying and supporting the management, protection and distribution of sensitive information, individual's information and other resources.
Based on the "framework" definitions of the Black's Law and Oxford dictionaries and on the present EIRA definition of "security and privacy policy". http://thelawdictionary.org/framework/ https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/framework
